participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Driven and ambitious, Emily radiates positivity and is always eager to help others. She enjoys participating in school activities and is well-liked by her peers.
participant_1.background: my current goal is to run a k. when i grow up i want to be a physical therapist. i'm currently in high school. i make straight as in school. i won homecoming queen this year.

participant_2.name: Jake Thompson
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and friendly, Jake loves to stay active and is always up for a chat. He enjoys sharing his fitness journey and doesn't take life too seriously.
participant_2.background: i've short hair. i go to the gym regularly. i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. two dogs live with me. eating is something i do when i am bored.
